text: Delicious food at an unbeatable price! If you're looking for authentic halal Chinese cuisine, this is the perfect spot for Muslim diners. The service is outstanding, and the place is always clean—highly recommended!

Very fragrant Hainan teh+ kopi, delicious tom yum bee hoon and chilli ban mee, and had the most amazing peanut butter french toast bite. Food is affordable and menu variety is extensive. Highly recommended, especially for its french toast
Had meals here a couple of times. Food is good. The cold drinks are nice especially when it’s a hot day. The chilli is good as well.

Second time visit this store. I recommend you to avoid lunch crowds as there are quite a lot of nearby office workers have their lunch over here but Weekend is quite empty. They serve the food pretty fast also.

- Main thing
Not sure about kantin (Malay spelling for Canteen, thats the fusion word I belived), I can ensure you that the nation school (sekolah kebangsaan) does not provide most of the menu selection.
Maybe international school? Idk...
But then, it seems to focus on Nyonya or kopitiam concept.

- Q&Q
Good quality with decent quantity.

- Services
Not so fast in terms of food to arrive, but friendly staff.

- Cleanliness
Very good.

- Pricing
Above Moderate.

- Atmosphere
Bright kopitiam setup.
